messages.subject: ~ Unschooling Voices-add your voice! ~
messages.msgSnippet: ... response and that all of you want to see it happen, as I do. It s going to be great! The first one will be out on July 1st. I put together a web page with
messages.messageBody:
:-) I'm so happy reviving the unschooling carnival got such a good
response and that all of you want to see it happen, as I do. It's
going to be great!

The first one will be out on July 1st. I put together a web page with
all the details. Here's the link:
http://www.foreverparents.com/UnschoolingVoices.html

I think I covered everything on it, but if you have a question, just
holler. Being this is a new, I'm kinda thinking as I go along so
please bear with me if I don't have all the details worked out
yet. :-)

If you can blog, post or add this to your website, that would be a
big help in getting the word out. I'll be posting this in several
places so I apologise if you see it more than once.

I think this is going to be fun for all of us and I am looking
forward to reading all of your posts. :-)

~ Joanne ~
Mom to Jacqueline (7), Shawna (11) & Cimion (13)
Adopted into our hearts October 30, 2003
http://anunschoolinglife.blogspot.com/
